SEARCH
Package app.apollo.common

Interface AuthService

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthProvider
public interface AuthService extends Remote
Remote interface for user authentication service using Java RMI.

This interface provides methods for user registration, login, logout, and session token validation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Session
    login(String token)
    Logs a user into the system using an existing session token.
    Session
    login(String username, String password)
    Logs a user into the system using their username and password.
    void
    logout(String token)
    Logs a user out of the system, invalidating their session token.
    boolean
    register(String username, String password)
    Registers a new user in the system.
    boolean
    validateToken(String token)
    Validates whether a given session token is active and recognized.

  • Method Details

    • register

      boolean register(String username, String password) throws RemoteException
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      username - The username (login) of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • login

      Session login(String username, String password) throws RemoteException
      Logs a user into the system using their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      A Session object representing the authenticated session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • login

      Session login(String token) throws RemoteException
      Logs a user into the system using an existing session token.
      Parameters:
      token - The session token of the user.
      Returns:
      A Session object representing the session associated with the token.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • logout

      void logout(String token) throws RemoteException
      Logs a user out of the system, invalidating their session token.
      Parameters:
      token - The session token of the user to log out.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • validateToken

      boolean validateToken(String token) throws RemoteException
      Validates whether a given session token is active and recognized.
      Parameters:
      token - The session token to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid and active; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.
